cards.name: Taaza Khabar
cards.Description: A public toilet caretaker's poverty-stricket life takes a drastic U-turn when he helps and old woman. How long will fate smile upon him?

cards.name: Govinda Naam Mera
cards.Description: Wedged between a court case, a bad marriage and his girlfriend,Govinda Waghmare gets further entangled in incidents complicating his already tangled world.

cards.name: Fall
cards.Description: An accident followed by memory loss has Divya trying to piece her life together. Will her near and dear ones support her quest for the truth?

cards.name: Monster
cards.Description: Trying to cope with the hardships, Bhamini and Anil's life turns catastrophic as Lucky Singh Invades. Secrets unveil when this uninvited guest starts his game.

cards.name: Freddy
cards.Description: Introverted and awkward Dr Freddy Ginwala desperately searches for a soulmate. When he finally finds her, the relationship becomes as painful as a root canal.

cards.name: Willow
cards.Description: Willow leads a group of misfit heroes on a dangerous rescue mission through a world beyond their wildest  imaginations.

cards.name: Sita Ramam
cards.Description: On a letter-delivering task, Afreen learns of a 20-year-old romance set amidst a war. Her quest to trace the lovers makes her embrace humanity beyond borders.

cards.name: Jhansi
cards.Description: Jhansi quest to uncover her past brings her onto the path of people who want her dead. How will she save hereself and her family from them?

cards.name: Brahmastra Part One: Shiva
cards.Description: A Journey of fantasy, action and romance comes to life as Shiva enters the Astraverse! He discovers true love and also, the power of fire within him.

cards.name: Sketch
cards.Description: A man who lost his love, and a woman who draws the future work hand in hand to capture a murderer.

cards.name: The Last Of Us
cards.Description: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

cards.name: Big Mouth
cards.Description: A lawyer, caught up in a murder case, becomes a notorious and genius con artist overnight, in order to fight against a huge conspiracy and survive.

cards.name: Butterfly
cards.Description: While trying to rescue her sister's kids from kidnappers, Geetha excavates shocking secrets about her dubious neighbours. What are they hiding?

cards.name: Disenchanted
cards.Description: It's been fifteen years since Giselle and Robert wed, and a frustrated Giselle turns to the magic of Andalasia in hopes of finding her happily even after.

cards.name: Chhichhore
cards.Description: Divided by time, united by a tragic incident. In a bittersweet reunion, seven middle-aged friends take a walk down the memory lane at the least expected place.

cards.name: Tanhaji
cards.Description: As Aurangzeb captures the Kondhana Fort, Tanhaji Malusare, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj's trusted military leader and braveheart, ventures out to win it back.

cards.name: Intelligent
cards.Description: Dharam Tej, a software engineer, is very loyal to his boss, Nandha Kishore. All is fine till a criminal gang kills Nandha and turns Dharam into Dharma Bhai.

cards.name: Super 30
cards.Description: Based on the life of ace mathematician Anand Kumar, who trained 30 underprivileged students to crack one of the toughest entrance exams in India - IIT.

cards.name: Aar Ya Paar
cards.Description: When the modern world's greed destroys his idyllic tribal existence, a valiant archer becomes a deadly assassin to get even.

cards.name: India's Most Wanted
cards.Description: Five Oridinary men, one global terrorist, witness India's biggest manhaunt operation in this film inspired by true events.

cards.name: House Of The Dragon
cards.Description: Set 200 years before the events of Game of Thrones, this epic series tells the story of House Targaryen

cards.name: De De Pyaar De
cards.Description: 50-year old Ashish has fallen in love with Ayesha, who is half his age. Their romance turns into a comedy, when he takes her to meet his parents and ex-wife.

cards.name: The Great Indian Murder
cards.Description: When notorious industrialist Vicky Rai is shot dead at his own party, the main suspects are the guests, both invited and uninvited.

cards.name: Aarya
cards.Description: Aarya is forced to return to India and face her family and enemies. With multiple attacks jolting her, can she and her children escape the threats of the past?

cards.name: Masoom
cards.Description: In the pursuit of Justice for her deceased mother, a fierce Sana Kapoor fights her father and uncovers secrets that can impair her relationship with her family.

cards.name: Moving In With Malaika
cards.Description: All set to showcase her true self, Malaika will shut down trolls in her quintessential Arora style as she opens up about her life.
